title: Build Your Own Electric Guitar
description:
Martin Koch shows us how to build an electric guitar from scratch.

also contains a printable plan for a Strat style guitar, and lots of freebies!!

spread the love!! :-)




Note:  

Problem: Pages advance automatically and there is no way to stop this behaviour.

Solution:

Press the keyboard keys "Ctrl" and "L" (Windows) or "Command" and "L" (Mac OS) to leave the full screen mode of Adobe Reader.

Choose from menu "Edit > Preferences"

Choose "Full Screen"

Check the box "Ignore all transitions" in the "Full Screen Appearence" section

Press "Ctrl" and "L" again to enter the full screen mode

Adobe Reader behaves from now on, but you have to check this box every time you want to use the videos.
